pageProduct.name: Thompson's Turmeric Joint Support 30 Tablets
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Thompson's Turmeric Joint Support reduces joint swelling and in?ammation and increases joint mobility.

Thompson's Turmeric Joint Support uses a patented form of Curcumin (derived from Turmeric) that may be more efficiently absorbed* than unformulated Curcumin. It helps relieve the symptoms and pain of mild osteoarthritis, reduce joint swelling and inflammation and increase joint mobility. * Curcumin formulated with phospholipids versus unformulated Curcumin.

Size: 30tabs

Oil-Free?: Yes

Shelf Life in Days: 1095

KEY FEATURES

• Efficiently absorbed
• May temporarily relieve joint inflammation/ swelling associated with mild arthritis
• May relieve pain associated with mild osteoarthritis
• Turmeric has a long history of use in Ayurvedic medicine as an anti-inflammatory and anti-arthritic.
• Vegetarian/Vegan friendly

Warnings

If symptoms persist consult your healthcare professional. Use only as directed and always read the label.

Ingredients

Active Ingredients: Each tablet contains
Curcumin (Phospholipid Complex) 500mg
equiv. to Curcumin 90mg

Directions

Store below 30°C in a dry place. Do not use if bottle and/or cap seal is missing or broken. Keep out of reach of children.

Storage Temperature: below 30°C

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
